word: Last night . . . I awoke once or twice in the night but did not get up till four o'clock. This was another victory gained in sleeping, for the previous night I had slept nearly eight hours. For this I feel very grateful to my heavenly Father.--Letter 321, 1905, pp. 1, 2, 6. (To Elder and Mrs. J. E. White, Nov. 27, 1905.)
